00013 // define a structure to hold discordant clusters
00014 struct DiscordantCluster {
00015 
00016   std::string cluster;
00017   std::string id;
00018   size_t tcount = 0;
00019   size_t ncount = 0; 
00020   std::unordered_map<std::string, bool> qnames; // TODO get rid of it
00021   std::unordered_map<std::string, Read> reads;
00022   std::unordered_map<std::string, Read> mates;
00023 
00024   double reads_mapq; 
00025   double mates_mapq;
00026   std::vector<int> mapq; // TODO remoe
00027   std::string contig = "";
00028 
00029   static std::string header() { return "chr1\tpos1\tstrand1\tchr2\tpos2\tstrand2\ttcount\tncount\tmapq1\tmapq2\treads"; }
00030 
00031   SnowTools::GenomicRegion reg1;
00032   SnowTools::GenomicRegion reg2;
00033 
00034   DiscordantCluster() {}
00035   ~DiscordantCluster() {}
00036   DiscordantCluster(ReadVec &this_reads, ReadVec &all_reads);
00037   DiscordantCluster(std::string tcluster);
00038   DiscordantCluster(std::string tcluster, SnowTools::GenomicRegion gr1, SnowTools::GenomicRegion gr2) {
00039     cluster = tcluster;
00040     reg1 = gr1;
00041     reg2 = gr2;
00042   }
00043 
00044   void addMateReads(ReadVec &bav);
00045 
00046   // return the mean mapping quality for this cluster
00047   double getMeanMapq(bool mate) const;
00048   
00049   double getMeanMapq() const;
00050   std::string toRegionString() const;
00051 
00052   // add the read names supporting this cluster
00053   void addRead(std::string name);
00054   
00055   // define how to print this to stdout
00056   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const DiscordantCluster& dc);
00057 
00058   // define how to print to file
00059   std::string toFileString(bool with_read_names = false) const;
00060 
00061   // define how these are to be sorted
00062   bool operator < (const DiscordantCluster& b) const;
00063 
00064 
00065 };

00067 typedef std::unordered_map<std::string, DiscordantCluster> DMap;
00068 typedef std::vector<DiscordantCluster> DVec;
